name: Flyn' Piggy
description:
You will be playing as a Wing Pig that have to escape the ever rising lava in the tower where you are taped.

Controls

  • Buttons and tutorial menu are intractable with "Mouse Left Click"
  • By pressing "Left Arrow Key (<)" you jump left
  • By pressing "Right Arrow Key (>)" you jump right

Mechanics

  • Jumps: the player have a limited amount of jump (shone by a stamina bar) and these can be incised.
  • Power Up: "Winged Corn" that increase the stamina the player have, if you accumulate enough it may help with the lava following you.
